subproject.description: This component will include a regional curriculum for dialogue facilitators, mentoring and coaching programs, learning journeys for practitioners, toolkits and virtual courses on democratic dialogue. As capacity building programs are rolled-out, technical assistance will change in nature from direct support to coaching and accompaniment.
subproject.title: CAPACITY BUILDING

subproject.description: Technical assistance will include conflict analysis, design, facilitation, systematization, logistics and assessment of dialogue and other change processes for crisis prevention. Most importantly, for both national and regional support, the Project will support the Country Offices’s strategies or the regional projects’ strategies rather than provide ad hoc support. The Project will partner with COs and regional projects to develop those strategies and incorporate dialogue to them.
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: TECHNICAL SUPPORT

subproject.description: Technical assistance will include conflict analysis, design, facilitation, systematization, logistics and assessment of dialogue and other change processes for crisis prevention. The Project will partner with COs and regional projects to develop those strategies and incorporate dialogue to them.

subproject.title: TECHNICAL SUPPORT

subproject.description: The Community of Practice and Learning is a key resource for the Project and needs to be continuously updated with systematized knowledge derived from dialogue practice, and to maintain continuous communications and interchange of regional information related to the field of dialogue for nurturing its practice. The communications strategy has proven to support knowledge dissemination and networking consolidation.
subproject.title: CoPL & COMMUNICATIONS

subproject.description: This project was created to support the administrative and finance management for the projects that belongs the Democratic Dialogue Regional Project:  a) Capacity Building; b) Technichal Support; c) CoPL& communications and d) Joint Border Initiative.
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: MANAGEMENT & OPERATIONS
